about_the_game:
The Ultimate Co-op Heist Experience

PLAN YOUR HEIST Every successful heist starts with a solid plan. In Rob Together, teamwork is the key to success. Gather your friends and take on roles like Hacker, Thief, Lookout, and Saboteur. Identify security vulnerabilities, study guard routines, and choose the best approach. Sneak through silently or create diversions to achieve your goals. Every decision will shape the outcome of your heist.


HACK, HIDE, AND STEAL Show off your skills and perfect your timing. Hack cameras and alarms, pick locks to access hidden areas, and collect valuable items while avoiding guards. Work together as a team to complete your objectives and escape without being caught. Every heist will push your team’s abilities to the limit.


ESCAPE WITH THE LOOT Getting in is one thing; getting out is a whole different adventure. After completing your mission, coordinate a stealthy escape. Find hidden routes, avoid patrolling NPCs, and ensure your team gets out safely with the loot. A flawless escape is the most crucial part of the heist.


COLLABORATE IN EVERY MISSION Rob Together delivers the full co-op heist experience. With dynamic environments, complex security systems, and countless strategies, every heist is unique. Play with up to 4 players and face the ultimate test of coordination, communication, and teamwork.

Rob Together isn’t just a game—it’s a challenge that tests your wit, speed, and teamwork. Can you and your crew pull off the perfect heist?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Rob Together is a CO-OP heist simulation where teamwork and strategy take center stage. Hack cameras, disable alarms, pick locks, and move stealthily to steal valuable items. Each heist is an adventure that requires your team to act in perfect harmony.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
